content: pride hearts free pattern pattern by grace grommes celebrate the lgbtqia+ community with pride flag hearts materials ● red heart super saver or caron yarn colors will vary depending on pride flag ● size g crochet hook 4 00 mm ● sewing needle & stitch marker ● polyester fiberfill abbreviations st/sts - stitch/stitches single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase 2 single_crochet in heart closed pride flag colors by row lesbian gay bisexual transgender intersex work all rounds in yellow embroider circle in center of heart with purple yarn asexual aromantic pansexual non-binary rainbow pride flag i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions feel free to reach out to me on my instagram @leapdoublecrochet or on my ravelry @leapdoublecrochet
